---
title: "Visualizing Attribution"
author: "Abby Mullen"
date: "02/03/2015"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

f = read.csv('editing_newspapers.csv')

f$year = f$Date %>%
  gsub('.*([0-9]{4}).*','\\1',.)

p <- ggplot(f, aes(x=year,y=ID,colour=as.character(ID)))
p + geom_jitter(position=position_jitter(height=.25)) + scale_y_discrete(labels = c("none","Alexandria Gazette","Literary Journal","Louisville Courier-Journal","Mobile Register","Munc Telegraph","National Intelligencer","New York Sun"))
